job_tasks.phrase: As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core function of a software engineer working with AI technologies, implying integration into customer solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the software engineering aspect of working with customer teams and improving products.

job_tasks.phrase: We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the development of solutions in collaboration with customers, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly states the development of software assets, a key software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.
job_tasks.justification: Reinforces the collaborative software engineering nature of the role.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions software engineering activities like architecture design, coding sprints, and making design decisions for AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the need to be a hands-on software engineer and write quality code.

job_tasks.phrase: We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
job_tasks.justification: Positions the role as part of an engineering crew with end-to-end ownership, a software engineering characteristic.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on building reusable assets and playbooks, which are software engineering outputs.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding customer needs and influencing product roadmaps, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.
job_tasks.justification: Mentions ML Ops, which is a key component of AI platform operations and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: You will also partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates collaboration with data science, which often involves data engineering aspects.

soft_skills.phrase: We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the need for quick upskilling and adapting to evolving technologies.
Indicates teamwork and collaboration with other engineers.

soft_skills.phrase: By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes interaction and collaboration with customer and product engineering teams.

soft_skills.phrase: working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers
soft_skills.justification: Highlights working alongside other engineers, indicating collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization
soft_skills.justification: Directly mentions collaboration with team members and the broader organization.

soft_skills.phrase: Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves.
soft_skills.justification: While not directly 'ownership', the emphasis on growth mindset and sharing viewpoints points towards an innovative and collaborative environment where individuals contribute actively.

soft_skills.phrase: help create life-changing innovations that impact billions around the world!
soft_skills.justification: This phrase speaks to innovation and the impact of the work, suggesting a drive for creating something significant.

soft_skills.phrase: partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap
soft_skills.justification: This involves partnering with another group to influence product direction, a collaborative effort.

soft_skills.phrase: partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates close collaboration with a different specialized team.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as 'Software Engineer', 'architecture design sessions', 'coding sprints', 'write quality code', and 'building reusable assets'. While it mentions AI offerings like Azure ML, Azure OpenAI, and ML Ops, the core focus is on integrating these into customer solutions and building platform assets, rather than deep model development or specialization in GenAI techniques like prompt engineering or RAG. The role is about applying AI technologies within a software engineering context, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the role being a Software Engineer who works with AI technologies. The responsibilities and required skills align well with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, with a strong emphasis on software development and integration rather than core AI model building.
